name: Two Guns
description:
Wild West. You are the new sheriff in this oblivion, but many residents, namely the bandits against your candidature for this position. Can you cope with all the villains and topple the evil sheriff from his illegal place.

Two Guns - Hardcore 2d shooter in the genre of vertical scrolling shooter. Inspired by old-school nes games and taking all the best and most interesting from our beloved childhood.

Game features:
- hardcore
- Old school
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
